name: Chaos-Spawn Goblin
description: A small humanoid goblin embodying chaotic evil, known for its cunning and agility.
memorable: Its ability to disengage and hide makes it a slippery opponent, often escaping or repositioning during battle.
goals: To ambush opponents and avoid direct confrontation, relying on cunning tactics.
relations: Often found in chaotic settings or working alongside other chaotic creatures.
environment: Typical of war-torn areas or spots of chaotic magic.
strengths: High dexterity and adept at stealth, enhancing ambush capabilities.
weaknesses: Low strength and intelligence limit its effectiveness in direct combat.
attacks: Uses a scimitar for melee attacks and can employ a ranged psychic attack.
most_powerful_ability: Psychic Stab allows it to deal significant psychic damage from a distance.
skills: Highly skilled in stealth, with a +6 modifier.
additional_information: Can communicate telepathically with other creatures.
Has a unique evasive ability with Nimble Escape.
test_queries: agile goblin that excels in stealth
goblin skilled in nimble escape tactics
